meanings.definition: The world or community of movies.
meanings.sent1: In moviedom, actors and directors work together to create entertaining films.
meanings.sent2: Many people dream of becoming a part of moviedom and seeing their name on the big screen.
meanings.sent3: The gossip magazines in moviedom always have the juiciest stories about celebrities.
meanings.sent4: To some, moviedom is like a magical land where anything is possible and dreams come true.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the depths of moviedom can lead to discovering hidden gems and cinematic treasures.

meanings.definition: The industry or business of making movies.
meanings.sent1: Studying the ins and outs of moviedom can help aspiring filmmakers understand the business side of the industry.
meanings.sent2: Competition is fierce in moviedom, with studios vying for the next big blockbuster.
meanings.sent3: Sometimes the behind-the-scenes drama in moviedom is more entertaining than the films themselves.
meanings.sent4: Navigating the twists and turns of moviedom requires a keen eye for trends and audience preferences.
meanings.sent5: Success in moviedom often hinges on a combination of talent, luck, and perseverance.
